Exercise of Stock Options: stock issued during period shares stock options exercised
Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period shares conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period shares new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: deferred compensation arrangement with individual shares issued
stock issued during period shares share based compensation
stock issued during period value share based compensation
Total Stock Issuance Value: stock issued during period value new issues

Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
stock repurchase program remaining authorized repurchase amount
Tax Effects from Stock Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital stock repurchased option premiums paid
adjustments to additional paid in capital stock repurchased option premiums received
__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share cash paid
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
